div.p: Year 7, Mesore 25, have paid to the bank in Diospolis that Asklepiades is in charge of, for tari(ch- ) of the same year, Onnophris and Harmachoros, in bronze with agio, two thousand eight hundred 40 ⟨dr.⟩, that is, 2,840 ⟨dr.⟩. 3,690 drachmas. Through Asklepiades. 3,990 ⟨dr.⟩. Translation: from edition with slight modifications
